It doesn’t get much less than for an entry-level monitor for casual gaming, so be sure to snag it after getting more details below.

items.title: Now even lower: Originally $110 Anker 3-in-1 MagSafe Charging Station now at $50
items.summary:
Anker MagGo 3-in-1 MagSafe Charging Station

Buy for $50 (Reg. $110)

What we love

While you’re not getting the new 25W wireless MagSafe charging standard here, 15W is plenty enough for most folks if you ask me, and especially at a price like this. Originally $110, you can now land this thing at 55% off, delivering 3-in-1 charging action for your entire Apple kit with a provided 40W USB-C PD wall charger.

items.title: Why won’t anyone stop ICE from masking?

Spigen Life Magnetic Gym Bag Tumbler Holder

Buy for $35 (Reg. up to $42)

What we love

These miniature gym bag tumbler holders have seemingly become more popular over the last year or so, and Spigen’s magnetic model is down at $35 right now. It features a drawstring/cord lock and D-ring strap to accommodate some additional accessories as well as a Molle System and a pocket for your phone too.

This week, we’ve got a few notable chances at some solid savings, with Lectric launching a weekend price cut flash sale taking $100 off all e-bikes starting from $799 lows, as well as $450 exclusive savings on three VMAX electric scooters that start from $749. We also have the soon-to-end Anker SOLIX Winter Sale with up to 65% discounts on power stations that start from $150, as well as a parallel 72-hour weekend flash sale from the brand that has given us some notable new and returning low prices starting from $429. We’ve got all that and more waiting for you below.
